tagline: A drinking club with a running problem.
body:
### Bend Hash House Harriers
Due to some unwelcome spam, we have decided to shut down the forum. However! We have been actively maintaining our [Facebook profile page](http://www.facebook.com/bend.harriers), and encourage you to become friends with us there.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: bendhash.github.com
